TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewUpdatedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用 方法或单击控件中的 "更新" 按钮时，但在 控件更新项后， 控件将引发 事件。The control raises the event when the method is called or when an Update button in the control is clicked, but after the control updates the item. （"更新" 按钮是一个按钮，其 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "更新"。）这使您可以提供一个事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如检查更新操作的结果。(An Update button is a button whose `CommandName` property is set to "Update".) This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of an update operation. 将 对象传递到事件处理方法。A object is passed to the event-handling method. 此对象使您能够确定已更新的项数并获取可能发生的任何异常。This object enables you to determine the number of items updated and to get any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定受更新操作影响的项的数目，请使用 属性。To determine the number of items that were affected by the update operation, use the property. 若要确定是否发生了任何异常，请使用 属性。To determine whether any exceptions occurred, use the property. 通过设置 属性，可以指示是否已在事件处理方法中处理异常。You can indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 您可以通过使用 属性访问原始字段值。You can access the original field values by using the property. 您可以通过使用 属性访问更新后的字段值。You can access updated field values by using the property. 默认情况下， 项在更新操作后返回到只读模式。By default, the item returns to read-only mode after an update operation. 如果处理在更新操作期间发生的异常，可以通过将 属性设置为 `true`，使 项处于编辑模式。If you handle an exception that occurred during the update operation, you can keep the item in edit mode by setting the property to `true`. 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 对象确定是否在更新操作过程中发生了异常。The following example shows how to use the object to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated/CS/ListViewItemUpdatedCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated/VB/ListViewItemUpdatedVB.aspx#1)]

related.span: 技术概述： ListView 控件

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化 类的新实例。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is primarily used by control developers when they raise events. 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 参数的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||`e` 参数中包含的 对象。The object that is contained in the `e` parameter.| ||`false`。`false`.| ||`false`。`false`.|

span.span: Technology Overview: The ListView Control

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AffectedRows As Integer
public: property int AffectedRows { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取受更新操作影响的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows that were affected by the update operation.

value.span: 受更新操作影响的行数。

span.span: The number of rows that were affected by the update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来确定受更新操作影响的行数，由数据源返回。Use the property to determine the number of rows that were affected by the update operation, as returned by the data source. 由于通常只更新一项，因此此属性通常包含值0或1。Because typically only one item is updated, this property usually contains a value of 0 or 1. 有时，在更新操作过程中，可能不会引发异常。Sometimes during the update operation an error can occur that does not raise an exception. 在这种情况下， 属性可用于验证是否已更新项。In that case, the property can be used to verify that an item was updated. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来验证是否已更新项。The following example shows how to use the property to verify that an item was updated. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated/CS/ListViewItemUpdatedCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated/VB/ListViewItemUpdatedVB.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取更新操作过程中引发的异常（如果有）。

span.span: Gets the exception, if any, that was raised during the update operation.

value.span: 更新操作过程中引发的异常（如果有）；如果未引发任何异常，则为 。

span.span: The exception that was raised during the update operation, if any; if no exception was raised, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定在更新操作过程中引发的异常（如果有）。Use the property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation. 如果未引发任何异常，则此属性将返回 `null`。If no exception was raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引发了异常，并且在事件处理程序中处理了异常，请将 属性设置为 `true`。If an exception was raised and you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 否则， 控件会重新引发异常。Otherwise, the control re-throws the exception. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来确定是否在更新操作过程中发生了异常。The following example shows how to use the property to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated/CS/ListViewItemUpdatedCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated/VB/ListViewItemUpdatedVB.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ExceptionHandled : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在事件期间处理了更新操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an exception that was raised during the update operation was handled during the event.

value.span: 如果异常已在事件处理程序中得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在更新操作过程中引发了异常，则使用 属性来指示在事件期间是否已处理异常。If an exception is raised during the update operation, use the property to indicate whether you have handled the exception during the event. 如果将此属性设置为 `true`，则此异常将被视为已处理，且不会由 控件重新引发。If this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not re-thrown by the control. 如果将此属性设置为 `false`， 控件将重新引发异常。If this property is set to `false`, the control re-throws the exception. 若要确定引发的异常，请使用 属性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来指示在事件处理程序中已处理异常。The following example shows how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated/CS/ListViewItemUpdatedCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated/VB/ListViewItemUpdatedVB.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeepInEditMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.KeepInEditMode : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在更新操作之后 控件是否应该继续处于编辑模式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control should remain in edit mode after an update operation.

value.span: 如果在更新操作之后该控件应继续处于编辑模式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control should remain in edit mode after an update operation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 控件在更新操作后返回到只读模式。By default, the control returns to read-only mode after an update operation. 将 属性设置为 `true` 以指定 控件应保留在编辑模式下。Set the property to `true` to specify that the control should remain in edit mode. 这也会保留用户输入的值。This also preserves the values that the user has entered. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性在发生异常时将 控件保持在编辑模式下。The following example shows how to use the property to keep a control in edit mode when an exception occurs. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated/CS/ListViewItemUpdatedCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated/VB/ListViewItemUpdatedVB.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NewValues As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取包含已更新项的新值的字典。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the new values for the updated item.
The new values for the updated item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可访问更新项的新字段值。Use the property to access the new field values for the updated item. 例如，你可以使用这些值来记录已更新的项目。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated items. 属性返回一个实现 接口的对象。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含 对象，这些对象表示更新项的字段。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated item. > [!NOTE] > 作为快捷方式，可以使用 对象的索引器直接访问字段值。As a shortcut, you can use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly.

related.span: 技术概述： ListView 控件

span.span: Technology Overview: The ListView Control

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OldValues As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取一个包含已更新项的原始值的字典。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the original values for the updated item.
The original values for the updated item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性访问已更新项的原始字段值。Use the property to access the original field values for the updated item. 例如，你可以使用这些值来记录已更新的项目。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated items. 属性返回一个实现 接口的对象。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含 对象，这些对象表示更新项的字段。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated item. > [!NOTE] > 作为快捷方式，可以使用 对象的索引器直接访问字段值。As a shortcut, you can use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly.
